fields.label: Modules
fields.name: modules
fields.instructions: Add new modules and customize them to build the page of your dreams. Have fun!

sub_fields.label: Module Type
sub_fields.name: moduleType
sub_fields.instructions: Select the type of module that you would like to build for this position on the page.

sub_fields.label: Information About This Module
sub_fields.message: This module consists of an image on the right with text, video, buttons, etc., on the left. To see a sample of this module Click Here.

sub_fields.label: Header Image
sub_fields.name: headerImage
sub_fields.instructions: This is the full width header image. It should be 1200x350, and the left side needs to be entirely blank except for the background color. We will place live text or a video over the top of the left side.

sub_fields.label: Video or Text
sub_fields.name: videoTextToggle
sub_fields.instructions: Would you like to display live text or a video on the left side of the header image area?

sub_fields.label: Header Image Title
sub_fields.name: headerImageTitle
sub_fields.instructions: This is the title of the paragraph on the left side of the header image.

sub_fields.label: Header Image Title Color
sub_fields.name: headerImageTitleColor
sub_fields.instructions: If the default title color does not work with the background color, use this to change it to something else.

sub_fields.label: Header Image Paragraph
sub_fields.name: headerImageText
sub_fields.instructions: This is paragraph of text that will appear on the left side of the header image area.

sub_fields.label: Header Button
sub_fields.name: headerButton
sub_fields.instructions: Do you want to show a "Call to Action" button below the paragraph of text?

sub_fields.label: Header Button Color Scheme
sub_fields.name: buttonColorScheme
sub_fields.instructions: Select the color scheme for your button.

sub_fields.label: Header Button Text
sub_fields.name: headerButtonText
sub_fields.instructions: What do you want written on the button?

sub_fields.label: Header Button URL
sub_fields.name: headerButtonLink
sub_fields.instructions: Where do you want the button to link to?

sub_fields.label: Information About This Module
sub_fields.message: This is nothing more than a basic text editor that allows you to place a block of text information on the page.

sub_fields.label: Text Block
sub_fields.name: textBlock
sub_fields.instructions: Write something great and put it in here.

sub_fields.label: Information About This Module
sub_fields.message: Click on the "Add Row" button to add additional design idea boxes. This is displayed on a 3-wide grid so for optimal display, you will want to add boxes to a total quantity that is a multiple of three.

sub_fields.label: Information About This Module
sub_fields.message: This is the module to use for adding sliders onto the page. Simply supply the ID number of the slider that you would like to display.

sub_fields.label: Slider ID
sub_fields.name: sliderID
sub_fields.instructions: Supply the number only. Do not add a pound sign or any shortcodes.

sub_fields.label: Information About this Module
sub_fields.message: This is the module that normally contains content on the left and the customer reviews block on the right.

sub_fields.label: Customer Reviews
sub_fields.name: customerReviews
sub_fields.instructions: Do you wish to show customer reviews on the right side of this module?

sub_fields.label: View Shirt Styles - Left
sub_fields.name: shirtStylesLeft
sub_fields.instructions: On the home page, you currently have two images being displayed in this section. However, if you would like to disable customer reviews, it may make sense to place one image in this section and place the other image in section on the right. The block for images on the right will appear if the "Customer Reviews" section becomes unchecked.

sub_fields.label: Information About This Module
sub_fields.message: This is the module that contains design ideas and links on the left side and the form on the right side.

sub_fields.label: Information About This Module
sub_fields.message: This is the module that will output the text boxes with icons and stars.

sub_fields.label: Stars
sub_fields.name: stars
sub_fields.instructions: Do you want to display the stars on the top right corner of these text blocks?

sub_fields.label: Information About This Module
sub_fields.message: This module will create the testimonial slider.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: testimonialColor
sub_fields.instructions: Use this field if you would like to change the background color of the testimonial module.

sub_fields.label: Information About This Module
sub_fields.message: This module is used to display a grid of T-Shirt designs in the same format as they appear on the design category pages. Only populate one of the design category fields and NOT BOTH.

sub_fields.label: Number of Designs to Show
sub_fields.name: designCount
sub_fields.instructions: Please enter the number of designs you would like to display in this module. This will display best if you select multiples of the number 4. Remember to skip this many if you use this module again.

sub_fields.label: Offset
sub_fields.name: offset
sub_fields.instructions: If this is the second or third module displaying this category on this page, please enter the number of designs being displayed in the preceding modules so that we can skip that many on this module.

sub_fields.label: Show "View All" Button
sub_fields.name: viewAll
sub_fields.instructions: If this is activated, the module will display a "View All" button below the grid of T shirt designs.

sub_fields.label: Design Category
sub_fields.name: designCategory
sub_fields.instructions: Please select a category in this field or the other field, but NOT both fields.

sub_fields.label: Secondary Design Category
sub_fields.name: secondaryDesignCategory
sub_fields.instructions: Please select a category in this field or the other field, but NOT both fields.

sub_fields.label: Information About This Module
sub_fields.message: This module will display posts from the blog.

sub_fields.label: Left: Banner Image
sub_fields.name: left_banner_image
sub_fields.instructions: This is the full width header image. It should be 600x175. We can also place live text or a button over the top of the left side.

sub_fields.label: Right: Banner Image
sub_fields.name: right_banner_image
sub_fields.instructions: This is the full width header image. It should be 600x175. We can also place live text or a button over the top of the left side.

sub_fields.label: Information About This Module
sub_fields.message: Click on the "Add Row" button to add additional design idea boxes. This is displayed on a 3-wide grid so for optimal display, you will want to add boxes to a total quantity that is a multiple of three.

sub_fields.label: Number of Group Names to Show
sub_fields.name: group_namesCount
sub_fields.instructions: Please enter the number of designs you would like to display in this module. This will display best if you select multiples of the number 4. Remember to skip this many if you use this module again.

sub_fields.label: Offset
sub_fields.name: group_namesOffset
sub_fields.instructions: If this is the second or third module displaying this category on this page, please enter the number of designs being displayed in the preceding modules so that we can skip that many on this module.

sub_fields.label: Show "View All" Button
sub_fields.name: group_names_viewAll
sub_fields.instructions: If this is activated, the module will display a "View All" button below the grid of T shirt Group Names.

sub_fields.label: Group Names Category
sub_fields.name: group_names_category
sub_fields.instructions: Please select a category in this field or the other field, but NOT both fields.

sub_fields.label: Secondary Group Names Category
sub_fields.name: secondary_group_names_category
sub_fields.instructions: Please select a category in this field or the other field, but NOT both fields.
